alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:08PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Stone, Izard, Fulton and eastern Baxter Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1008 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Gamaliel Landing to near Rodney to near Blanchard Springs Campground. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Melbourne... Salem in Fulton County... Horseshoe Bend... Calico Rock... Oxford... Viola... Pineville... Franklin... Bexar... Flint Springs... Ott... Sturkie... Wideman... Lone Star... Byron... Gid... Rodney... Lunenburg... Culp... Gamaliel Landing... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Arkansas.
